name: Unreal Parkour By Supar Godly
description:
This is a parkour game for Brackeys game jam.

You've been knocked out and put into a sim machine, and you are the test subject for an evil military. Beat the parkour challenges and escape!

Music is by us.

Skyboxes by AvionX. Their asset page is here: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/skybox-series-fr...

Install instructions:

For Windows and Linux the install is basically unzipping the zip file and then running the game, however mac users will have trouble due to MacOS not trusting applications from zip files. To install on Mac you either have to not use the built in macOS unzipper and use an external one or you can look up that special command that allows it.
